name: HashiCorp Vault KV 最小
description: node-vault で KV に set/get（トークン要）。

files.template:
const vault = require('node-vault')({ endpoint: process.env.VAULT_ADDR||'http://127.0.0.1:8200', token: process.env.VAULT_TOKEN||'' });
(async ()=>{ await vault.write('secret/data/demo', { data: { hello: 'world' } }); const r = await vault.read('secret/data/demo'); console.log(r.data.data); })();
